resources.string:
This app utilizes a standard color scale to estimate hemoglobin level. This software uses a multiple linear gression to analyze the RGB color values from the calibration colors on the left and interpolates the blood spot's hemoglobin value on the right. 
 
 Step 1: Enter patient name and ID on the main screen. Press Start. 
 
 Step 2: Finger prick the patient and place a drop of blood on the filter paper. Press Scan. 
 
 Step 3: Position the camera roughly parallel above to the card. Make sure the camera can capture the entire card on the screen. 
 
 Step 4: Press Measure to take a measurement.
Finger prick the patient and place a drop of blood on the filter paper. Then press Scan.
